original_text: Moses said to the people, ‘Do not be afraid. God has come to test you. He wants you to respect him and to obey him. Then you will not do things that are wrong.’
korean_text: 모세가 백성에게 이르되 두려워하지 말라 하나님이 임하심은 너희를 시험하고 너희로 경외하여 범죄하지 않게 하려 하심이니라

sentences.original_text: God has come to test you
He wants you to respect him
Then you will not do things that are wrong
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 너희는 잘못된 일을 하지 않을 것이다
